about_the_game:
Explore the Harper Household (Demo Version)

In this demo of Horror at the Harpers, you will explore a portion of the eerie Harper residence. This limited version offers a sneak peek into the haunted environments filled with cursed objects, and unsettling atmospheres. Your objective in this demo is to progress deeper into the available area.

Limited Paranormal Entities
As you venture deeper, you will confront dangerous supernatural beings that block your path. In the demo you will face the first entity in the game.

Discover Clues
Uncover a handful of documents and notes in this demo, which provide a glimpse into the house's mysterious past. These scattered pieces of lore will hint at the dark events that transpired, setting the stage for the full game's story.

Atmospheric Horror in a Compact Experience
This demo is a small slice of the full atmospheric horror experience. Feel the tension build as you navigate dark hallways, hear ominous noises, and encounter unexpected threats.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10,11
  • Processor: i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Graphics: GTX 970 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yeah probably so
  • Additional Notes: For the ultimate horror experience, play with high-quality headphones in a dark room :)

short_description: Dive into a gripping first-person horror adventure as Tony, a father searching for his lost daughter, Ellie. Connect with the spirit world, face demonic forces, and explore a chilling atmosphere that will test your nerves and courage to the limit.
